name: standings
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool rugby_live_data.
Tool description: Rugby fixtures, results, standings and live match coverage from around the world.
API description: Fetches and returns the standings for a specified season and competition.

season_id.description: The ID of the season for which the standings are to be fetched.

comp_id.description: The ID of the competition for which the standings are to be fetched.
